nodes.text: The Governor of Telos was a political title used by the reigning governor of Telos IV. In 53 BBY the title was held by Crion, the father of Qui-Gon Jinn's Padawan Xanatos. Xanatos betrayed Jinn during the Telosian Civil War in that year, and during that conflict Crion was killed. Hukowl An Devi, Crion's Ithorian advisor, became the new governor. When Jinn returned to Telos with his new Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi in 44 BBY, there was another governor.
